thread.title: First Week Sales Projections For Future's "HNDRXX"
thread.title_full: First Week Sales Projections For Future's "HNDRXX"

author: Danny Schwartz
title: First Week Sales Projections For Future's "HNDRXX"
text:
Home > Music > First Week Sales Projections For Future's "HNDRXX" First Week Sales Projections For Future's "HNDRXX" 0 0 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Feb 28, 2017 at 09:31am Future is projected to become the first artist ever to debut two albums at #1 in consecutive weeks. 
Future's self-titled album debuted at #1 with 140K units sold in its first week. HDD has published first-week projections for HNDRXX : the album is expected to move between 110K and 125K units . 
Future faces competition from John Mayer and country group Little Big Town, but HNDRXX is still projected to go #1 by a comfortable margin. If this projection holds up, Future would become the first artist in history to earn two #1 album debuts in consecutive weeks. It would be his fifth straight #1 album.
